patterns: The model will look for these patterns in the input.
You can add as many patterns as you want.
Don't make them too similar to prevent overfitting of data.
Don't try to confuse the model by adding similar patterns with different tags as it will result in loss of accuracy.
responses: These can be the responses which the bot will result if the input relates to the pattern.
A random response will be returned from the list of responses.
You can add as many responses as you want.
Just keep a single response in the list if you want to return a single response every time.
Hi, how can I help you?
Hello, how are you doing today?
